attributes.action: Petition to support Councillor Kevin Foster in his refusal to sign a gagging order regarding the Ricoh Arena discussions.
attributes.additional_details:
"Tory city councillors are refusing to sign a “gagging order” banning them from speaking publicly about private talks over Ricoh negotiations with the Sky Blues."

I believe that the fans of Coventry City Football Club and taxpayers of Coventry deserve to know the details of any discussions regarding the sale of The Ricoh Arena. I fully support Councillor Kevin Foster in his stance and have started this petition to send a message to Councillor John Mutton that the people of Coventry need to know exactly what is going on.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Coventry City Council.
